entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -10.3°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
